div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 en-mission-statement et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Inspire the rising generation to reach the heights of their potential, ignite their curiosity to venture into challenging new learning experiences, and empower them to be leaders through service, who are committed to family and community. THEN, they can achieve their goals and dreams!

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1 entheos-header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

p.span: Watch your email for a schedule of fun ways that students are celebrating Spirit Week!

ul.li: Second Term Ends on Thursday, March 12th, 2020 – This will be an early-release day.
Snow Day Make-Up on Friday, March 13th, 2020 – This will be an early-release day to make up for the snow day taken on February 3rd.

div.p: Every school day starting on Tuesday, September 3rd, 2019 at the Kearns Campus, you can spend your morning eating breakfast and reading books with a volunteer!
If you have questions or would like to volunteer, please contact Dina Wecker at [email protected].
Entheos Academy is not responsible for information obtained through links to non-school sites. Please contact school website staff if you are concerned about a link to a non-school site.
